name: apex-ai-platform
description: APEX AI Security Platform - Unified Development Environment

scripts.start: echo "🚀 Starting APEX AI Platform Development Environment..." && concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan.bold,yellow.bold,green.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "CLIENT-PORTAL,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start-client-portal" "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.start-client-portal: echo "🌐 Starting Client Portal on http://localhost:5173" && cd client-portal && npm run dev
scripts.start-backend: echo "⚡ Starting Backend API on http://localhost:5001" && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.start-frontend: echo "🛡️ Starting Frontend Live Monitoring on http://localhost:3000" && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.stop: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || killall node 2>/dev/null || echo 'No Node processes to kill'
scripts.build: echo "🏗️ Building Client Portal..." && cd client-portal && npm run build
scripts.build-all: npm run build && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.install-all: echo "📦 Installing all dependencies..." && npm run install-client-portal && npm run install-backend && npm run install-desktop
scripts.install-client-portal: echo "📦 Installing Client Portal dependencies..." && cd client-portal && npm install
scripts.install-backend: echo "📦 Installing Backend dependencies..." && cd backend && npm install
scripts.lint:fix: cd client-portal && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.type-check: cd client-portal && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run typecheck
scripts.test: cd client-portal && npm run test || echo 'No tests configured for client-portal'
scripts.health-check: curl -s http://localhost:5001/api/health || echo 'Backend not running on port 5001'
scripts.ports-check: echo "🔍 Checking ports..." && netstat -an | findstr :5001 && netstat -an | findstr :5173 || echo 'Ports available'
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo "✅ Setup complete! Run 'npm start' to begin development."
scripts.info: echo "📋 APEX AI Platform Info:" && echo "   🌐 Client Portal: http://localhost:5173" && echo "   🛡️ Frontend Live Monitoring: http://localhost:3000" && echo "   ⚡ Backend API: http://localhost:5001" && echo "   📚 API Docs: http://localhost:5001/api/docs" && echo "   💾 Database: PostgreSQL (check .env for connection)"

author: APEX AI Security Platform
